oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Habits of the Bat and the Porcupine, etc. By Dia!kwain, from his parents (L V.-6. 4378-4403). About the fine hearing of the porcupine and how the people hunting it must not make a noise or it will hear them. 1) This story is a note that explains line 3, p.4402 of A Bushman belief about the bat and the porcupine, 2) This story is found in Book V-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: About the fine hearing of the porcupine
